input.sentences: thousands of people around the world gathered to promote bicycle safety .
there were several well known guest speakers .
after the last of them spoke
attendees had the opportunity to have their picture taken with the speakers .
the day ended with one last celebratory photo for all of the money raised to help families of individuals injured in bicycle accidents .
output.sentences: People are joined together at a safety rally.
Many people were there to listen to everyone speak.
Everyone got to learn about all kinds of bicycle safety information.
